entry.title: XengShi/materialYouNewTab
entry.summary:
A Simple New Tab ( browsers's home page ) inspired with Google's 'Material You' design

Initialized : Sun 20 Aug 2023 03âˆ¶41âˆ¶08 PM IST

Material You NewTab

Material You NewTab is an extension for your browser that replaces the default New Tab or homepage, providing a fresh and modern look inspired by Googleâ€™s Material You design. This extension can be installed on nearly any browser, including Google Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Brave, and Safari.

With a variety of themes to choose from, you can personalize your browser according to your preferences. You can also enter your name or a custom text, so every time you open your browser, youâ€™re greeted with your personalized message. Additionally, it allows you to search using your preferred search engineâ€”whether it's Google, DuckDuckGo, Bing, or YouTubeâ€”without needing to manually change the settings each time.

ðŸ”´ðŸŸ¡ðŸŸ¢ Test live : https://xengshi.github.io/materialYouNewTab/

Installation Guide

Download

Clone the Repository git clone https://github.com/XengShi/materialYouNewTab.git or You can download the latest version of the extension by clicking the button below:

Installation

Chromium Based Browsers

  1. Make sure you have cloned this repo git clone https://github.com/XengShi/materialYouNewTab.git or downloaded it from here.

    • If downloaded as a .zip or tar.gz file, extract it first.

  2. Copy & Paste the URL into your browser's search bar:

    Chrome : chrome://extensions

    Edge : edge://extensions

    Brave : brave://extensions

  3. Enable developer options (See the screenshots below).

  4. Click on 'Load unpacked' option.

  5. Browse & Select your extension folder.

Firefox:

In Firefox, you can download it from the Mozilla Extensions Store at:
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/material-you-newtab/

 or 

  1. Make sure you have cloned this repo git clone https://github.com/XengShi/materialYouNewTab.git or downloaded it from here.
    • If downloaded as a .zip or tar.gz file, extract it first.
  2. Delete the existing manifest.json file from your extension folder.
  3. Rename manifest(firefox).json to manifest.json.
  4. Copy & Paste the following URL into your browser's search bar:
    about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox
  5. Click on "This Firefox" in the left sidebar.
  6. Click on the "Load Temporary Add-on" button.
  7. Browse and select the updated manifest.json file from your extension folder.

Safari:

  1. Make sure you have cloned this repo git clone https://github.com/XengShi/materialYouNewTab.git or downloaded it from here.
    • If downloaded as a .zip or tar.gz file, extract it first.
  2. Open Safari and click on Safari in the top menu bar, then go to Preferences.
  3. Click the "Advanced" tab and check the box that says "Show Develop menu in the menu bar".
  4. In the menu bar, go to Develop > Show Extension Builder.
  5. Click the "+" button to add your extension.
  6. Browse & Select your extension folder.
  7. Click Install.

Installation Video

For a step-by-step installation guide, watch the video below:
